name: Diablo
description: Diablo 1 with The Hell 2 mod https://www.patreon.com/thmod
notes:
- You will need to provide diabdat.mpq during script install.
- Use default options during the Windows setup. 
- Close the game with Alt+F4 if it launches automatically at the end.
content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/DiabloTH2/TH2.exe
files:
- thehell2:
    filename: th2.zip
    url: https://www.moddb.com/downloads/mirror/170128/124/b96dea89c175547fcd3d15a0820a358a
game:
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: diabdat.mpq
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/DiabloTH2
    file: thehell2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/DiabloTH2
    src: $DISC/diabdat.mpq
